lead_paragraph: An Alfred Hitchcock thriller may wrap up its loose ends in under two hours, but a longstanding legal dispute over whether the 2007 movie "Disturbia" infringes on the copyright of Hitchcock's "Rear Window" and its source material is far from over.
snippet: The trust that holds the copyright to the short story from which "Rear Window" was adapted has filed a new lawsuit against Universal over its 2007 movie "Disturbia."

headline.main: Another New Twist in 'Rear Window' Dispute

abstract: The trust that holds the copyright to the short story from which "Rear Window" was adapted has filed a new lawsuit against Universal over its 2007 movie "Disturbia."
